docs.title: Welcome to JAX Agents
docs.text:
Modular and scalable JAX implementation of reinforcement learning agents, including PPO and IPPO.

📦 GitHub: amavrits/jax-agents

docs.title: Features
docs.text:
• 🧠 PPO & IPPO
  • ⚡️ Fast JAX training
  • 📦 Modular design
  • ✅ Checkpointing, logging, and more!
